syncMethod

public void syncMethod(long currentTime)
Description copied from class: AbstractPeer
A Synchronized method that is called in each time unit. This feature is disabled by default, and can be enabled by setting 'true' the SicsSimConfig.SYNC_UPDATE. This is an abstract method.

Specified by:
syncMethod in class AbstractPeer
Parameters:
currentTime - The current time of the system.
See Also:
SicsSimConfig
